text:
HealthRight | San Francisco, CA | Full Time ONSITE

We're a growing team of passionate and highly ambitious people with a data-driven eHealth platform built to deliver customized solutions and beautiful health experiences to our users. We've recently merged a successful b2c doctor's network with a high-powered performance marketing team to scale our proven model under HealthRight, and we're looking for motivated backend engineers to have significant impact on our scalable technology.

Stack includes - Ruby on Rails, AWS, PostgreSQL

Dev ops experience a plus.

More info can be found at: http://sfbay.craigslist.org/sfc/eng/5150707467.html

Reach out to me directly via careers@healthright.com if interested
